document_data.mainbody:
Nonabune was an inhabitant of the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Nonabune was a hin man with a light skin tone, dark brown eyes, and long dark brown hair.
In the , Nonabune could be found in the docks of the Lower City of Baldurs Gate, where commoners could buy fresh fish. The docks were attacked by a band of sahuagin when the area was visited by the Absolute Adversaries, if was unknown if Nonabune survived the attack. If he managed to survive, he was eager to write a story about the attack, calling it "When Fish Fight Back."
